competitors.name: Very Limited Competition
competitors.notes: In 2002, Nessus was pioneering the remote vulnerability scanner market. Tenable founded in 2002.

context: 2002 was Tenable's founding year. Nessus, created by Renaud Deraison in 1998 as open-source, had essentially invented remote vulnerability scanners. At this time, Nessus went from being the only vulnerability scanner to the leading one. Competitive landscape was minimal. Nessus remained open-source until October 2005.
